Assistant doctors are trained to handle immediate care until Ramana garu sees. The new facility is very near Nallagandla main road and has ample parking space. General medicine and infertility are on different floors. A couple of years back, I had the fortune of receiving the right advise and treatment from Dr Srilatha Gorthi too! 
The doctor couple are a blessing to the Hyderabad society! May they be blessed with great health and well-being!

review: He is a very knowledgeable person. He identified the symtoms the minute we entered the room and was spot on. Doesn't hurry up and never jumps into conclusion.
